data.title: RS PRO Polyester Tool Wallet 400mm x 295mm x 80mm (Closed)
meta_keywords: RS PRO Polyester Tool Wallet 400mm x 295mm x 80mm (Closed)
data.meta_description: 707-7268, RS PRO, RS PRO Polyester Tool Wallet 400mm x 295mm x 80mm (Closed), Brand RS Pro, Material Polyester, Length Closed 400mm, Length (Closed) 400mm, Width Closed 295mm
data.text:
From RS PRO, this polyester tool wallet is a versatile solution to on-the-go tool storage. With a simple zip-up design, and a variety of tool holding loops inside, the tool wallet presents a stylish, neat and organized way to keep you most essential tools to hand.

Although a soft case, the tool wallet is made from hard-wearing polyester and is suitable for heavy-duty use. It has a brief-case style handle for ease of carrying.

The polyester wallet is optimized for storing handy tools such as screwdrivers, pliers, and cutters, and as such, it is an ideal companion for electrical engineers. The wallet has an internal holster and a closable pocket that is able to store fixings and fasteners.

The binder style tool wallet fully closes with a zipper, for a neat and compact way to store tools when they are not in use.

Features and Benefits

 Reinforced and padded construction in polyester

 Heavy-duty zip fastener along 3 sides with carrying handles

 Various sized, pockets, elasticated straps & pouches

 Dimensions: 400 x 295 x 80 mm

Applications

This wallet is a highly versatile way of keeping smaller essential tools to hand. The briefcase-style handle allows for maximum portability, while it's soft case nature makes it easier to carry than a conventional tool briefcase. This high-quality tool case might be used by;

 Electricians

 Technicians

 Maintenance engineers

 DIY Enthusiasts

Why RS PRO?

RS PRO aims to be your go-to brand when you look for dependability and value for money. Sourcing a range of versatile tools and components, we employ in-house experts to ensure RS PRO branded products are synonymous with quality and excellence.

When it comes to tool storage enclosures, chests and cabinets, RS PRO provides a range of durable and versatile options. Whether you're a mechanic, engineer, electrician or DIY enthusiast, RS PRO has a tool storage solution to suit your needs.
